remarks: A sum commutation from ` sum_ n <_ A , sum_ d || n , B ( n , d ) ` to ` sum_ d <_ A , sum_ m <_ A / d , B ( n , d m ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-May-2016.)
statement:
dvdsflsumcom.1 $e |- ( n = ( d x. m ) -> B = C ) $.
dvdsflsumcom.2 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvdsflsumcom.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) /\ d e. { x e. NN | x || n } ) ) -> B e. CC ) $.
dvdsflsumcom $p |- ( ph -> sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) sum_ d e. { x e. NN | x || n } B = sum_ d e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` A ) ) sum_ m e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` ( A / d ) ) ) C ) $.
$d A d m n x $.
$d B m $.
$d C n $.
$d d m n ph $.
